channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rushing for the exit: Illegal immigrant population down 1.6 million under Trump crackdown

item.title: D.C.’s Problems Require a Long-Term Fix
item.description: While President Trump has the power to deploy the National Guard to the capital, it is not necessarily wise.

item.title: Inventing Climate Liability: An International Court’s Big Adventure
item.description: Climate adaptation and mitigation require technological innovation and economic growth, not legal warfare between nations.

item.title: The Real Case for Protectionism
item.description: MBD responds to David Bahnsen’s reaction to his critique of free trade.

item.title: There Is No Way To Moderate Transgenderism. It Must Be Destroyed
item.description: A New York Times author quietly made a series of admissions that, only a few years ago, would have been dismissed as reactionary bigotry.

item.title: Denver Post Doxxes Citizens For Sharing Pictures And Public Records About Crime
item.description: The Denver Post published the names, locations, and employers of three private citizens for sharing public records on social media.

item.title: Democratic Party approval hits a new rock bottom among Democrats
item.description: The Democratic Party has hit a new low with its own voters.

item.title: Washington, D.C., Is a Disgrace
item.description: Trump’s indictment of D.C. for allowing lawless young people to blight the city is accurate.

item.title: Securing Justice For Russiagate Is How We Save The Country

item.title: Arizona Leftist Senator Doubles Down On Her ‘Right’ To Tip Off Illegals To ICE Operations
item.description: Liberals, including the state's Dem attorney general, have jumped to Analise Ortiz's defense, but the dangers of her actions are very real.

item.title: Inflation holds steady as Trump ramps up new tariffs
item.description: Prices rose 0.2% in July in a sign that tariffs haven't had a major impact on inflation so far, the government said Tuesday.
